TopicTitle: Bug Report: Tower ladders in KSC

Articles.Content:
I just completed an EVA inside KSC. There is a ladder on a tower within the complex (not to spoil) close to statue.

The kerbal was able after several oscillating attempts to climb. However on the return it got stuck, and could not move either up or down.

Finally I switched to the craft and recovered the craft, hoping that on the switch back the kerbal would move.

Instead the kerbal disappeared, and when I looked into the astronaut complex it was listed as KIA.

This is a windows 32, latest game version (Economic Boom).

I do have mods but this craft had none installed.
